text: The 2016 FINA Men's Youth Water Polo World Championships was held in Montenegro from 26 August to 3 September. ==Qualified teams== ==Preliminary round== {| class="wikitable" |- | style="background:#76ee00| |Team advances to Quarterfinals |- | style="background:#ffff66| |Team advances to Play-off |- | style="background:#ffc5c5| |Team competes in Placement matches |} ===Group A=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" !
